newsitem.title: USA: Blue-chip stocks end powerhouse rally.
newsitem.headline: Blue-chip stocks end powerhouse rally.

text.p: Blue-chip stocks closed lower Thursday, snapping a three-session winning streak that produced a powerhouse rally of nearly 290 points in the Dow Jones industrial average.

Based on early and unofficial data, the Dow ended 21.27 points lower at 6,658.60. In the broader market, advancing issues led declines by a slim margin on active volume of 504 million shares on the New York Stock Exchange.
